channel.title: What are the main problems that make your server lag?
channel.description:
Hey,
i was wandering what are the main problems that make your server lag, any help would be appriciated
thanks -fatcat :eek:

item.title: What are the main problems that make your server lag?

item.description:
@v3n0m4 wrote:

I would say the ones i find are a problem on people’s servers is alot of people and alot of spawned objects

item.title: What are the main problems that make your server lag?
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

That is not the only cause of lag. I will write you a few pages on it and make a post or i will simply re-edit this post with the information so as not to double post. but i can pull out maybe 2 pages max.

item.title: What are the main problems that make your server lag?
item.dc:creator: @F0rum_Mvp F0rum Mvp
item.description:
@F0rum_Mvp wrote:

mainly if people mass on the server… and also people who get banned get annoyed and spam on the server. Also if your server has the ::pnpc command it can sometimes lag the server aswell. sorry if this is the wrong information.
